scripts.build: react-scripts build && rm build/asset-manifest.json && rm build/static/js/*.txt && mv build/static/js/main.*.js build/static/js/main.js && mv build/static/css/main.*.css build/static/css/main.css && cp -R src/icons src/js src/libs manifest.json build && sed -i '' 's~/static/media/~chrome-extension://__MSG_@@extension_id__/static/media/~g' build/static/css/main.css && clear
